title: Why Southeast Asia’s online scam industry is so hard to shut down
full_text: Why Southeast Asia’s online scam industry is so hard to shut down. Cambodia’s arrest and extradition of a powerful tycoon accused of running a vast online scam network marks a rare strike against an industry that has stolen .... KUALA LUMPUR, Malaysia (AP) Cambodias arrest and extradition of a powerful tycoon accused of running a vast online scam network marks a rare strike against an industry that has stolen tens of billion… [+6452 chars]
